series: AI Universe Neural Networks - Pure Visual
originalPrompt:
Create an incredible visualization of massive synaptic lightning storms across space!

Show cosmic-scale electrical storms where neural activity creates spectacular lightning displays:
- Enormous lightning storms with neural branching patterns
- Electric discharges flowing between planets and star systems
- Synaptic energy creating aurora-like displays in space
- Neural storm systems rotating and evolving across cosmic regions
- Beautiful electrical phenomena showing neural communication

Visual elements:
- Massive lightning storms with neural tree-like branching
- Electric discharges in brilliant blues, purples, and white
- Synaptic energy creating spectacular cosmic aurora effects
- Storm systems showing organized neural activity patterns
- Lightning networks connecting distant cosmic regions
- Beautiful electrical phenomena flowing through nebulae
- Sense of cosmic-scale neural communication in action

Absolutely no readable symbols or text elements!
Pure electrical neural storm visualization!
revisedPrompt: Unleash your creativity and depict a cosmic scene of enormous synaptic lightning storms spanning across the vastness of space. Visualize luminous electric discharges, bearing resemblance to neural networks, branching out and flowing between celestial bodies. These discharges should glow in spectacular shades of brilliant blues, purples, and radiant white. Allow synaptic energy to paint aurora-like displays in the cosmic backdrop, filling it with an exquisite spectacle of color and light. Imagine storm systems that rotate and evolve across various cosmic regions, showing organized patterns similar to neural activity. lightning networks should be connecting distant regions of space, providing a sense of cosmic-scale neural communication. Incorporate beautiful electrical phenomena flowing through nebulae, showcasing the intricacies of neural communication. The entire image should completely lack any clear symbols or text, focusing solely on the unadulterated visual representation of these spectacular electrical neural storms.
